name: Power And Chaos
description:
Hello everyone!

I am a professional game writer.

Ukraine is my motherland. War brought me a lot of pain, but also became an inspiration to create my own project.

I decided to develop a game about the war in Ukraine considering my skills and interests.

For now, there is only the first quest, which is made in the style of a visual novel. But if we wil see that people are interested in this idea, then we will definitely finish write a continuation and create many more similar quests.

The game has not yet worked out the characters and locations. Because the main purpose of this quest lies in the fact to tell the story of ordinary civilians that were found themselves in the war zone.

But with the further development of the project, detailed types of characters, locations and other components of the game space will definitely be created in it. And the images will be processed by the designer to create a consistent visual style for the entire game.

During the passage, we advise you to turn on your fantasy as much as possible. And to try to put yourself in the shoes of the protagonist. He is an ordinary person that who lives an ordinary life. But one day his life changes drastically because he suddenly finds himself in a war zone. Now any of his decisions can lead to death or salvation. And if he manages to survive, then in any case, this war will divide his life into "Before" and "After".

This quest has a several different endings and the result will depend on your decisions.

This version is for PC or tablets only. 

Smartphone version here: https://ukrplay.itch.io/power-and-chaos-mob

You can contact the developer in Telegram.
